text: Rolf-Dieter Amend (21 March 1949 â€“ 4 January 2022) was an East German slalom canoeist. He was born in Magdeburg, Allied-occupied Germany. He won a gold in the C-2 event at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich. Amend died on 4 January 2022, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for East Germany Category:Canoeists
title: Rolf-Dieter Amend
